entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
